extends jade.tools.ToolAgent

This is the main class of the ASCML.

createSubscription

public jade.lang.acl.ACLMessage createSubscription(jade.core.AID ascml,
                                                   AbsModel model)
                                            throws jade.content.lang.Codec.CodecException,
                                                   jade.content.onto.OntologyException
Creates a subscription message which can be used to subscribe to an ASCML. If you want to use it to just get the status of a model, you have to change the performative and the protocol

Parameters:
ascml - The ascml to adress the message to
model - The model to subcribe to
Returns:
The ACLMessage to send away to start a subscription
Throws:
jade.content.lang.Codec.CodecException
jade.content.onto.OntologyException
